com.soen.risk.model

Class RiskPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.model.RiskPlayer

  • public class RiskPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

    Player Model

    This class is used to set and get the values of the parameters for players.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yogesh Nimbhorkar
